attributes.action: Stop travel companies charging excessive charges for changes to booking details.
attributes.background: I am travelling with my wife to Fuerteventura in December 2018 and was charged £50 each (£100) for a booking change as an admin charge, even though this was on the telephone and the change was sent by email to me. I think this charge is unjustifiable and a more realistic charge should be applied.

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about charges for changing booking details, but we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out a a legal limit to be set on the level of these charges if that is something you would like to see.
